title: Pinching Hand Medium Light Skin Tone
description: A hand with the thumb and index finger pinched together, often used to indicate a small amount, a precise measurement, or a subtle hint. The medium-light skin tone variation.

The thumb and index finger are brought together in a precise pinch, with a slight curvature and soft rounded edges that enhance its delicate yet defined appearance. This emoji, with its nuanced rendering on Apple‚Äôs displays, is commonly used to convey a small amount, a hint of something, or to playfully suggest something is just right.
